roleset.name: changing language
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, translate.01. Corresponds to VNcls turn-26.6.1.

example.name: arg3
example.text: Translation out of hype - speak : some kook made threatening noises at Brownback and got arrested . The end .

example.name: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: The Pope was so infuriated by his teachings and his translation of the Bible into English, that 44 years after Wycliffe had died, he ordered the bones to be dug-up, crushed, and scattered in the river!
